Alumni

This page showcases previous students that completed thesis related with our research topics.

MSc Thesis

  • Ricardo Gonçalves Macedo, Computação Segura em Bases de Dados NoSQL (Secure Computation on NoSQL Databases),2017
  • Cláudia Fernandes Ribeiro, Escalonamento de pedidos para um serviço de bases de dados relacional externo (), 2017, Now at VISA
  • José Pedro Pereira, Towards Building Partial Memberships with Network Sampling, 2017, Now at ..
  • José Luís Ribeiro, Níveis de Coerência de Dados em Sistemas de Muito Larga Escala (Consistency Criterions in Very Large Scale Database Systems), 2017, Now at XPandIT
  • Diana Martins, Safe storage of medical images in NoSQL databases, 2016, Now at EuroTux
  • Pedro Ferreira, AIoTA: an IoT Platform on MonetDB, 2016, Now at MonetDB Solutions
  • Pedro Guimarães, Monitoring and analysis of queries in distributed databases, 2015, Now at OutSystems
  • João Miranda, Replicação de Bases de Dados Baseada em Comunicação em Grupo (database replication based on group communication), 2015, Now at Vilt
  • André Costa. Gestão de Bases de Dados Relacionais em Cloud Computing (Relational Databases Management for Cloud Computing), 2015, Now at Vilt
  • Francisco Neves, On efficient support for relational data in Apache HBase, 2015
  • Mário Pinto, Secure computation of SQL, 2014, Now at Etamax
  • Fábio Coelho, Implementation and test of transactional primitives over Cassandra, 2013
  • Luís Zamith, Bridging the Gap Between SQL and NoSQL, 2012, Now at SubVisual
  • Pedro Gomes, Migração de aplicações legadas para bases de dados NOSQL, 2011, Now at Oracle

PhD Thesis

  • Fábio Coelho, Towards a Transactional and Analytical Data Management System for Big Data, 2018
  • Maciel Costa, Efficient adaptive query processing on large database systems available in the cloud environment, 2017, Now faculty at UFRN
  • Francisco Cruz, Towards autonomic workload aware NoSQL databases, 2016, Now at SafeCloud
  • Francisco Maia, Epidemic Store for Massive Scale Systems, 2015, Now at SafeCloud
  • Miguel Matos, Epidemic algorithms for large scale data dissemination, 2013, Now faculty at IST
  • Ricardo Vilaça, Clouder : a flexible large scale decentralized object store, 2012, Now at LeanXcale
  • Alfranio Correia, Practical database replication, 2010, Now at Oracle

Post-Docs

  • Nuno Machado, Now at Teradata
  • Rui Gonçalves, Now at LeanXcale

We are part of the High-Assurance Software Laboratory, one of the integrated R&D centres of INESC TEC and a subunit of University of Minho.
